## Recommended SDK for bug and crash reporting [Instabug](https://try.instabug.com/react-native/?utm_source=awesomereact&utm_medium=spon&utm_content=header)
[![react-native](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9888943/35385975-e6829fc0-01d2-11e8-963f-2166c4a67763.gif)](https://try.instabug.com/react-native/?utm_source=awesomereact&utm_medium=spon&utm_content=banner)
> We highly recommend integrating Instabugâ€™s framework as they compiled a lot of great features in their SDK that provides useful and rich data with each bug/crash report. 
They removed the hassle of debugging as the SDK automatically attach screenshots, screen recordings, device details, network logs and repro-steps with each bug report which speeds up development process. [**learn more.**](https://try.instabug.com/react-native/?utm_source=awesomereact&utm_medium=spon&utm_content=learnmore)ğŸš€
[![](https://instabug-ga.appspot.com/UA-41982088-6/github/awesomereact?pixel)](https://instabug.com)

## Conferences

general conferences can be found on the [ReactJS
site](https://facebook.github.io/react/docs/conferences.html).
